'''''Proof of a Hero''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must sound the four horns near the [[Grand Wrestling Grounds]] in [["Collective of Plenty"]] in the following order: Bottom-left, top-right, bottom-right, top-left.

==Trivia==
* The resulting tune matches the [[soundtrack]] of the Grand Wrestling Grounds.
